label: uncl8025
comment: Code specifying the purpose of the conveyance call.

values.label: Cargo operations
values.comment: Discharging and/or loading of cargo.

values.label: Passenger movement
values.comment: Embarking and/or disembarking of passengers.

values.label: Taking bunkers
values.comment: Taking bunker (refuelling).

values.label: Changing crew
values.comment: Changing crew member(s).

values.label: Goodwill visit
values.comment: Friendly visit.

values.label: Taking supplies
values.comment: Taking supplies.

values.label: Repair
values.comment: To effect repair.

values.label: Laid-up
values.comment: Inactive service.

values.label: Awaiting orders
values.comment: Awaiting job order.

values.label: Miscellaneous
values.comment: Miscellaneous purpose of call.

values.label: Crew movement
values.comment: Embarking and/or disembarking of crews.

values.label: Cruise, leisure and recreation
values.comment: To visit a port for cruise, leisure and recreation.

values.label: Under government order
values.comment: This is a visit to a port which has been ordered by government.

values.label: Quarantine inspection
values.comment: To have a quarantine inspection.

values.label: Refuge
values.comment: To seek protection against something unpleasant and/or threatening such as bad weather or danger.

values.label: Unloading cargo
values.comment: Discharging of cargo from the means of transport.

values.label: Loading cargo
values.comment: Loading of cargo onto the means of transport.

values.label: Repair in dry dock
values.comment: Vessel to undergo repair in a dry dock.

values.label: Repair in wet dock
values.comment: Repair of a vessel in a dock without removing the surrounding water.

values.label: Cargo tank cleaning
values.comment: Cargo tanks of the means of transport will be cleaned.

values.label: Means of transport customs clearance
values.comment: Means of transport will be customs cleared.

values.label: De-gassing
values.comment: Means of transport will be de-gassed.

values.label: Waste disposal
values.comment: Means of transport will dispose of her waste.

values.label: Offshore mobilization operations
values.comment: Preparing or finalizing a vessel or platform for offshore operations.

values.label: Transfer of personnel
values.comment: Transfer of personnel from or to a means of transport.

values.label: Pass through
values.comment: Means of transport will pass through only.
